channel.title: Run Server.bat
channel.description:
i am using EasyRSC when i double click the Run Server.bat i get this error: [CODE]Buildfile: C:\Users\Ruud\Documents\RSPS Stuff\Mijn Server Spullen\RSC\EasyRSC\Server\build.xml
runserver: [java] java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.io.WorldLoader.loadSection(WorldLoader.java:113) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.io.WorldLoader.loadWorld(WorldLoader.java:37) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.model.World.getWorld(World.java:83) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:29) [java] Caused by: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionException: Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem as it does not have a no-args constructor [java] ---- Debugging information ---- [java] message : Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem as it does not have a no-args constructor [java] line number : 3 [java] path : /linked-list-array/linked-list/InvItem [java] cause-message : Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem as it does not have a no-args constructor [java] class : [Ljava.util.LinkedList; [java] cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAccessException [java] required-type : org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem [java] ------------------------------- [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:45) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.convertAnother(ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.java:39) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.AbstractCollectionConverter.readItem(AbstractCollectionConverter.java:82) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.CollectionConverter.populateCollection(CollectionConverter.java:60) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.CollectionConverter.unmarshal(CollectionConverter.java:53) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:38) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.convertAnother(ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.java:39) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.AbstractCollectionConverter.readItem(AbstractCollectionConverter.java:82) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.ArrayConverter.unmarshal(ArrayConverter.java:51) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:38) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.convertAnother(ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.java:39) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.start(TreeUnmarshaller.java:99) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathMarshallingStrategy.unmarshal(ReferenceByXPathMarshallingStrategy.java:12) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStream.java:552) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStream.java:540) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fromXML(XStream.java:497) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.util.PersistenceManager.load(PersistenceManager.java:41) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.entityhandling.EntityHandler.<clinit>(EntityHandler.java:341) [java] ... 4 more [java] Caused by: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAccessException: Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem as it does not have a no-args constructor [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.PureJavaReflectionProvider.newInstance(PureJavaReflectionProvider.java:50) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ReflectionConverter.instantiateNewInstance(ReflectionConverter.java:148) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ReflectionConverter.unmarshal(ReflectionConverter.java:90) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:38) [java] ... 21 more [java] Exception in thread "main"
BUILD SUCCESSFUL Total time: 2 seconds [/CODE]
can someone help me with it? P.S. i am to a birthday

easyrsc has to be compiled with java 6. or as hikilaka is going to be a super awesome guy and correct me, you could just update the xstream library

[code=java]package org.rscdaemon.server.model;

class InvItem {
public InvItem() { /*empty / }
/ class members */
}[/code][/quote]
